item.title: Leigh add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Don't think or judge, just listen." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Leigh add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and theyâ€™ll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back." -- John Green

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "I guess that's what saying good-bye is always like--like jumping off an edge. The worst part is making the choice to do it. Once you're in the air, there's nothing you can do but let go." -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Remember, we're madly in love, so it's all right to kiss me anytime you feel like it." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "I am not pretty. I am not beautiful. I am as radiant as the sun." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "I don't want to lose the boy with the bread." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Yes, frosting. The final defense of the dying." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Stieg Larsson
item.description: "There are no innocents. There are, however, different degrees of responsibility." -- Stieg Larsson

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "The bond forged between us was not one that could be broken by absence, distance, or time. And no matter how much more special or beautiful or brilliant or perfect than me he might be, he was as irreversibly altered as I was. As I would always belong to him, so would he always be mine." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "You have to know what you stand for, not just what you stand against." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "Is it possible for home to be a person and not a place?" -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "You should never be surprised when someone treats you with respect, you should expect it." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "It's a penis,' Grandma said. 'Stephanie got it in the mail. It's a pretty good one too." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Leigh add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description:
"I know what you're thinking," Grandma said into the silence. "Do I have anymore bullets in this here gun? Well, with all the confusion, what with being locked up in a refrigerator, I plumb forgot what was in here to start with. But being that this is a 45 magnum, the most powerful handgun in existence, and it could blow your head clean off, you just got to ask yourself one question. Do you feel lucky today? Well, do you, punk?"
Christ," Spiro whispered. "She thinks she's f**king Clint Eastwood." -- Janet Evanovich
